name: @emtecinc/single-spa-backbone
description: a single spa plugin for backbone.js apps

scripts.build: rimraf lib && mkdir lib && babel src/single-spa-backbone.js --out-file lib/single-spa-backbone.js --source-maps && babel src/single-spa-backbone-loader.js --out-file lib/single-spa-backbone-loader.js --source-maps && babel src/single-spa-backbone-unloader.js --out-file lib/single-spa-backbone-unloader.js --source-maps

author: Emtec Inc
